610961_mid: No introduction needed here! Let’s get started!
610965_mid:
Hope you aren’t burnt right down to cinders from
all that studying.
610965_end: How will you tackle this exam?
611046_mid:
Are you ready for the exam, dear child? Don’t ease
up just because you think you’ve studied enough.
611046_end:
It’s time to show you the power of my Pokémon
and me! We’ve studied just as hard as my students!
